tool_description: Transcribe youtube videos to text using openAI's wisper
name: Youtube Transcribe
title: Youtube Transcribe

api_list.name: transcribe
api_list.description: The endpoint /transcribe is a web service endpoint that allows users to submit a YouTube video URL and receive the transcribed text of the video's audio. The service uses a combination of YouTube-dl and a speech-to-text model to download the video, extract the audio, transcribe the audio, and return the transcribed text to the user. The endpoint accepts a GET request and requires a single parameter, "video_url", which should contain a valid YouTube video URL. Upon successful processing of the video, the endpoint will return a JSON object containing the transcribed text of the video's audio. If an error occurs during the transcription process, the endpoint will return a JSON object containing an error message.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-transcribe.p.rapidapi.com/transcribe/ntXoPgHylTg"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-transcribe.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-transcribe.p.rapidapi.com/transcribe/{video_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-transcribe.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
